text: evan islattai - kanniyattai natukirano, avan, ellak kanniyamum allahvukke uriyatakum (enpatai arintu kollattum); tuymaiyana vakkukalellam avan pakkame meleric celkinrana salihana (nalla) amalai ellam avan uyarttukiran; anriyum evarkal timaikalaic ceyyaccati ceykirarkalo avarkalukkuk katinamana vetanaiyuntu - innum ivarkalutaiya catittittam alintu pokum
